Basic ANGSD GWAS using HS and LS fish on DSM genome. Then we can try a kmer based approached. 

```{r}
m36<-read_csv("meta/m36.csv")
m36 %>% select(Path) %>% write_tsv(col_names=FALSE, file="bamlists/36.bamlist")
m36 %>% select(ybin) %>% write_tsv(col_names=FALSE, file="bamlists/36.pheno")
```

```{sh, eval=FALSE}
 srun -p high -t 10:00:00 --mem=64G --nodes=1 --ntasks-per-node=1 --cpus-per-task=12 \
 $HOME/angsd/angsd -P 12 -doAsso 1 -doPost 1 -yBin bamlists/36.pheno \
 -GL 1 -nThreads 12 -minInd 18 -rf outputs/101/chrom-regions.txt  \
 -minMapQ 10 -minQ 20 -minMaf 0.05 \
 -doMajorMinor 1 -doMaf 1 -SNP_pval 1e-6 -out outputs/102/do-asso \
  -bam bamlists/36.bamlist > outputs/102/do-asso.out 2> outputs/102/do-asso.err &
```

	-> Number of sites retained after filtering: 62429 

```{r}
data<-read_tsv("outputs/102/do-asso.lrt0.gz")
```

```{r}
df <- data %>% mutate(log10p = -log10(dchisq(LRT, df = 1))) %>%
  filter(log10p>=0 & log10p != "Inf") %>%
  mutate(p = dchisq(LRT, df=1)) %>%
  mutate(bonfer = p.adjust(p, method = "bonferroni")) %>% 
  mutate(BHfdr = p.adjust(p, method = "BH")) %>%
  group_by(Chromosome) %>%
  mutate(adjpchrom = p.adjust(p, method = "bonferroni")) %>%
  mutate(BHfdrchrom = p.adjust(p, method = "BH"))

df %>% arrange(-LRT) %>% head(n=20)
```

```{r}
nb.cols <- length(unique(df$Chromosome))
mycolors <- colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, "Set1"))(nb.cols)
#randomize
mycolors<-sample(mycolors)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df) +
  geom_point(aes(x=Position, y=log10p, color=Chromosome), alpha=0.75, cex=0.5) +
 # geom_hline(yintercept = -log10(0.05/nrow(dddf)), col="black", linetype=2, alpha=0.5) +
#  geom_hline(yintercept= 8, col="black", linetype=1, alpha=0.5) +
  theme_bw() +
#  scale_x_continuous(breaks=chroms$Position, labels=chroms$Chromosome) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45, hjust = 1, face="bold", size=8)) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_color_manual(values=mycolors) +
  ylab("-log10(p)\n") +
  xlab("\nChromosome") +
  ggtitle("HS vs LS") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5) ) +
  theme(plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust=0.5)) +
  facet_wrap(.~Chromosome, ncol = 5, scales="free_x") +
  theme(axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), axis.text.x = element_blank())
```
